alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 1:52PM MST until February 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and flash freeze possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible. Quickly dropping temperatures will be capable of freezing road surfaces on Sunday afternoon and evening. Gusty easterly winds on could create blowing snow conditions, making travel difficult. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
